q: earned produces some unexpected results. A couple of months ago, when David Letterman introduced Bruce Willis on his show to promote the action-comedy movie Reds, the talk-show host declared in apparent amazement that Bruce Willis had earned more than$ 1.5-billion at the box office. But David Letterman 's researchers seriously low-balled Bruce Willis 's impact.
